candidate_description: Dynamic and collaborative team player with a proven track record of fostering constructive relationships and driving impactful results in fast-paced environments.

education.degree: B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science
education.institution: Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering

experience.description: Developed and deployed machine learning models using libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Implemented feature engineering and hyperparameter tuning to achieve 95% accuracy in classification tasks and 90% precision in regression tasks.
key_achievements: Achieved 95% accuracy in classification tasks and 90% precision in regression tasks

experience.description: Gained hands-on experience in both front-end and back-end development. Contributed to meaningful projects, enhancing skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and server-side technologies. Developed a dynamic web application, improving user engagement by 20% and optimizing code for faster load times.
key_achievements: Improved user engagement by 20% and optimized code for faster load times

projects.name: Game Hub
projects.description: A multi-game platform featuring Wordle, Sims Clone, and Tic Tac Toe.
projects.achievements: Utilized Three.js and Socket.io in Sims Clone for real-time interactions and seamless movement within the game world, enhancing user engagement and providing a dynamic multiplayer experience.

volunteering: Events and Logistics Lead at DJS Beats, the Official Music Club at DJ Sanghvi College of Engineering
